directions: Combine garbanzo beans, black beans, tomatoes, onion, parsley, olive oil, lemon juice, garlic, salt, and pepper together in a bowl. Allow to sit for flavors to blend, 15 to 30 minutes.
ingredients: 1 pinch salt and fresh coarsely ground black pepper to taste (optional)
title: Balela (Chickpea and Black Bean Salad)
